metadata.description: Marvel Knights returns as a platform for the continuing influx of unique independent voices to Marvel--as an amnesiac Dr. Bruce Bannner awakens on the banks of the Sienne--and soon finds himself in a desperate race through the streets of Paris! Who is hunting him--and how are they both transforming into grotesque Hulks?A mindbending mystery + an iconic city + huge monsters = quirky cool Hulk action downloaded directly from the mad minds of Keatinge & Kowalski
metadata.name: Marvel Knights: Hulk
